dependencies.name: py-pip
dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools-scm
dependencies.description: The blessed package to manage your versions by scm tags.

dependencies.name: py-futures
dependencies.description: Backport of the concurrent.futures package from Python 3.2

dependencies.name: py-monotonic
dependencies.description: An implementation of time.monotonic() for Python 2 & < 3.3

dependencies.name: py-typing
dependencies.description:
This is a backport of the standard library typing module to Python
versions older than 3.6.

dependent_to.name: py-luigi
dependent_to.description: Workflow mgmgt + task scheduling + dependency resolution

dependent_to.name: py-plotly
dependent_to.description: An interactive, browser-based graphing library for Python
